---
title: "settings.json"
---

## High-level description
This code defines Visual Studio Code workspace settings specific to the project. It configures formatters for different file types, sets up Python testing with pytest, and disables other linters.

## Symbols
There are no named symbols in this code, as it is a JSON configuration file.

## Configuration
This file defines various configuration options for Visual Studio Code:

| Option                     | Type    | Default | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | editor.defaultFormatter | string | null | Sets the default formatter for the editor. Set to null to allow different formatters for different file types. |
| [typescript].editor.formatOnSave | boolean | true | Enables automatic formatting of TypeScript files when saving. |
| [typescript].editor.defaultFormatter | string | "esbenp.prettier-vscode" | Sets Prettier as the default formatter for TypeScript files. |
| [python].editor.formatOnSave | boolean | true | Enables automatic formatting of Python files when saving. |
| [python].editor.defaultFormatter | string | "ms-python.black-formatter" | Sets Black as the default formatter for Python files. |
| isort.args | array | ["--profile", "black", "--filter-files"] | Configures isort to use the Black profile and filter files. |
| python.formatting.provider | string | "none" | Disables the built-in Python formatting provider. |
| python.testing.pytestArgs | array | ["${workspaceFolder}/metering_billing"] | Sets the arguments for pytest, specifying the test directory. |
| python.unitTest.unittestEnabled | boolean | false | Disables the unittest test runner for Python. |
| python.unitTest.nosetestsEnabled | boolean | false | Disables the nose test runner for Python. |
| python.unitTest.pyTestEnabled | boolean | true | Enables the pytest test runner for Python. |
| python.linting.pylintEnabled | boolean | false | Disables Pylint for Python linting. |
| python.linting.enabled | boolean | false | Disables Python linting altogether. |
| [typescriptreact].editor.defaultFormatter | string | "esbenp.prettier-vscode" | Sets Prettier as the default formatter for TypeScript React files. |

## Dependencies
This configuration file implies the use of several VS Code extensions:

| Dependency | Purpose |
|:-----------|:--------|
| esbenp.prettier-vscode | Formatter for TypeScript and TypeScript React files |
| ms-python.black-formatter | Formatter for Python files |
| ms-python.python | Python language support and testing |

Note: These extensions need to be installed separately in VS Code for the configuration to take effect.

## Error Handling
This configuration file does not implement any error handling mechanisms as it is a static JSON configuration.

## Logging
This configuration file does not implement any logging mechanisms.
